SKT_FIRST.name: Heart Seeker
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 부여합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>的几率对目标造成<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_SECOND.name: Bloody Roar
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) Inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the enemy with the highest Speed for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color> while ignoring Resilience, and grants <color=#28d9ed>Pureblood's Dominion</color> to all allies at the start of battle. These effects cannot be removed.\n\n(Active Effect) Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (パッシブ効果)戦闘開始時、最もスピードが高い敵単体に効果抵抗を無視する<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。味方全体には<color=#28d9ed>鮮血の領域</color>を付与する。これらの効果は解除されない。\n\n(アクティブ効果)敵全体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で対象に<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (패시브 효과) 전투 시작 시 속도가 가장 빠른 적 한 명에게 대상의 효과 저항을 무시하고 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color>동안 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color>을 부여합니다. 아군 전체에게는 <color=#28d9ed>선혈의 영역</color>을 부여합니다. 이 효과들은 해제되지 않습니다.\n\n(액티브 효과) 적 전체를 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> 확률로 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 부여합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh:
(被动效果) 战斗开始时,使速度最高的1名敌人无视目标的效果抵抗,并造成<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。使全体友军获得<color=#28d9ed>鲜血领域</color>效果。这些效果不会
被解除。

(主动效果) 攻击全体敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>的几率对目标造成<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: ダメージUP\n出血1個追加発生
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 伤害提升\n额外触发1次出血

SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\nダメージUP
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 转化为强化技能\n伤害提升

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Pure Blood Archdemon
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: When using this skill, removes <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from all enemies, then attacks them. Deals increased damage and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Reduced Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>3 turn(s)</color> if the target is inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: スキル使用時、敵全体の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除し、敵全体にダメージを与える。対象が<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>状態の場合、ダメージがUPし、スキル使用後<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>3ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 스킬 사용 시 적 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제하고 적 전체를 공격합니다. 대상이 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color> 상태라면 피해가 증가하고 스킬 사용 후 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>3턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 使用技能时,解除全体敌人的<color=#28d9ed>1个</color><color=#28d9ed>强化效果</color>,并攻击全体敌人。若目标处于<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>状态,则使伤害提升,且使用技能后<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>3回合</color>。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict Bleeding on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で出血を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 적 전체에게 출혈을 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率对全体敌人造成出血效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>的几率造成<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
